thread.title: Great hotel
thread.title_full: Great hotel - Review of Premier Inn London Euston Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: John957
title: Great hotel
text:
Another great stay in a Premier Inn this time in London Euston. This hotel is very convenient for Euston train station. A short 5 minute walk away. Also very close to St Pancras if you are thinking about an overnight stay in London before you travel to Paris from St Pancras. Very close to King's Cross train station too, all within a 10 minute walk of Euston Premier Inn. A great hotel, great service and a great location for exploring London or travelling on to another destination. Thanks Premier Inn.
Room Tip: A high room is preferable due to some road noise, more of a drone than a noise though. Rooms are air... See more room tips
